document.full_text: the united nations on friday launched a study of the health, safety and security impact of the accident at japan's fukushima nuclear plant, which was crippled by an earthquake and tsunami in march.
document.title: u.n. launches study of japan nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: the united nations on friday launched a study of the health, safety and security impact of the accident at japan's fukushima nuclear plant, which was crippled by an earthquake and tsunami in march.
